intro: This section highlights the pivotal role of Palestinian women in resistance, community building, and preserving cultural identity amidst ongoing challenges.

profiles.name: Dr. Hanan Ashrawi
profiles.bio: A prominent Palestinian Christian leader, legislator, activist, and scholar who served in the Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO).

profiles.name: Leila Khaled
profiles.bio: A Palestinian refugee and member of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine (PFLP). She gained international attention for her role in plane hijackings in 1969 and 1970.

profiles.name: Rasmea Odeh
profiles.bio: A Palestinian-American activist who was a prominent figure in the Palestinian community in Chicago.

orgs.name: Women's Centre for Legal Aid and Counselling (WCLAC)

sources.title: Palestinian Women: A Force for Change
